name: The 13 Club
description:
You just acquired a small cabin from a tax sale.

You should be able to make a profit if you can flip the house fast enough. Spend one day working on cleaning and repairing it.

Unfinished: I think too big and can never finish a game jam with all my ideas intact. When finished there will be 13 characters to read about with 13 different stories to play through. Right now you get just the one story.
